title: About the Author
text:
Affiliation: Tropical Ecology and Entomology (TEE) Lab

I’m a PhD candidate at the Asian School of the Environment in NTU. I have a huge fascination with insects, particularly dung beetles. I wasn’t much of a coder until I started my PhD. Through the course of my projects and as a teaching assistant, I’ve realized my newfound appreciation to coding and data visualization.
As a young researcher, I hope this website serves as an encouragement that you aren’t struggling alone in your own coding journeys.



Photo by Marx Yim

title: Gallery
text:
Dung beetle-feeding trophic networks depicting dung beetle-dung interactions in a Singapore forest fragment






Data obtained from: Ong et al. 2020
Map of GBIF insect species records from 2001 to 2020

Data obtained with rgbif.
Observed taxonomic and functional metrics for dung beetle communities attracted to baited pitfall traps and flight interception traps across three habitat types in a Bornean rainforest

Source: Ong et al. 2021

title: Network Analysis
text:
Load data

MR <- read.csv('matrix_MR.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #MacRitchie
CH <- read.csv('matrix_CH.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Chestnut
BT <- read.csv('matrix_BT.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Bukit Timah
BKE <- read.csv('matrix_BKE.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #BKE
BB <- read.csv('matrix_BB.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Bukit Batok



Calculate network level indices

net.MR <- networklevel(MR, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.MR <- data.frame(net.MR)
colnames(df.MR)= c("MR")

net.CH <- networklevel(CH, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.CH <- data.frame(net.CH)
colnames(df.CH)= c("CH")

net.BT <- networklevel(BT, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BT <- data.frame(net.BT)
colnames(df.BT)= c("BT")

net.BKE <- networklevel(BKE, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BKE <- data.frame(net.BKE)
colnames(df.BKE)= c("BKE")

net.BB <- networklevel(BB, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BB <- data.frame(net.BB)
colnames(df.BB)= c("BB")

net.cmb <- cbind(df.MR, df.CH, df.BT, df.BKE, df.BB) # Combine calculated indices into 1 table
net.cmb

                         MR        CH        BT       BKE         BB
links per species 1.1428571 1.2727273 1.5000000 1.5000000  0.8888889
nestedness        9.0014845 1.0482984 0.0000000 7.7184861 21.3553715
H2                0.5088466 0.3461385 0.1841228 0.3790849  0.2998723




Create Plots

MacRitchie network

plotweb(sortweb(MR, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)






Chestnut network

plotweb(sortweb(CH, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75"), 
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75"), 
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75"), 
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)






Bukit Timah network

plotweb(sortweb(BT, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),  
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),  
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)






BKE network

plotweb(sortweb(BKE, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)






Bukit Batok network

plotweb(sortweb(BB, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),  
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)

title: A PhD Student's Coding Adventures
text:
Xin Rui 8/30/2020


library(bipartite)



MR <- read.csv('matrix_MR.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #MacRitchie
CH <- read.csv('matrix_CH.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Chestnut
BT <- read.csv('matrix_BT.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Bukit Timah
BKE <- read.csv('matrix_BKE.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #BKE
BB <- read.csv('matrix_BB.csv', header = T, row.names=1) #Bukit Batok



net.MR <- networklevel(MR, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.MR <- data.frame(net.MR)
colnames(df.MR)= c("MR")

net.CH <- networklevel(CH, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.CH <- data.frame(net.CH)
colnames(df.CH)= c("CH")

net.BT <- networklevel(BT, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BT <- data.frame(net.BT)
colnames(df.BT)= c("BT")

net.BKE <- networklevel(BKE, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BKE <- data.frame(net.BKE)
colnames(df.BKE)= c("BKE")

net.BB <- networklevel(BB, index=c("links per species", "nestedness", "H2"))
df.BB <- data.frame(net.BB)
colnames(df.BB)= c("BB")

net.cmb <- cbind(df.MR, df.CH, df.BT, df.BKE, df.BB) # Combine calculated indices into 1 table
net.cmb
##                          MR        CH        BT       BKE         BB
## links per species 1.1428571 1.2727273 1.5000000 1.5000000  0.8888889
## nestedness        9.0014845 1.0482984 0.0000000 7.7184861 21.3553715
## H2                0.5088466 0.3461385 0.1841228 0.3790849  0.2998723





plotweb(sortweb(MR, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        bor.col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        bor.col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75","gray75"), 
        col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"), 
        bor.col.low=c("gray0","gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75"),
        ybig=1.1,
        low.spacing=0.01,
        high.spacing=0.01)




plotweb(sortweb(CH, sort.order = "dec"), 
        method="normal", arrow="down.center", 
        col.interaction=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75"),

plotweb(sortweb(BT, sort.order = "dec"),

        col.high=c("gray15","gray30","gray45","gray60","gray75","gray75","gray75"),
